author: David Leichner
title: How new data technologies are being used to combat the global pandemic
description: Daily routine has been disrupted and business realities have changed overnight.
content: We are all glued to our screens tracking the progress of the ongoing pandemic.  Our daily routine has been disrupted, and business realities have changed overnight. Factories are converted to produce respirators, restaurants are limited to take away, retailer… [+4065 chars]
